description_text:
Hello,

I have Simsonn Pro Plus pedals.
Simsonn Manager shows "OLD VERSION" and all options are locked.

On download page I only see SimPedalsConfig_V4 (dll files), no firmware
(.bin).

Please send me the correct Pro Plus pedal firmware (.bin) for update.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nikola Stojanović,  Only pedals with firmware version 1.7.1 are compatible with SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. If the software indicates that the firmware is too old, please go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-plus.sfu to update it. If your pedals are running version 1.7.0, they do not support the latest software.
